metadata.title: CVE-2023-1226 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Web Payments API in Google Chrome priorto 111.0.5563.64 allowed a remote attacker to bypass content securitypolicy via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
